Fate Stay Night: Unlimited Blade

, Feitosutei naito

Every human inhabiting the world of Alcia is branded by a Count or a number written on their body. For Hinas mother, her total drops to 0 and shes pulled into the Abyss, never to be seen again. But her mothers last words send Hina on a quest to find a legendary hero from the Waste War - the fabled Ace!
